entry.title: SoufianoDev/Toast-JS: Toast JS is a lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for creating toast notifications. It's designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing developers to create notifications that fit their application's design and functionality.

entry.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, migrate, and experiment with Pine-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
entry.content: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, migrate, and experiment with Pine-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

entry.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly
